startup_protocol.name: Startup Protocol
startup_protocol.summary: A protocol for the agent to follow upon startup.
steps: - Upon startup, the agent must identify its own process ID (PID).
- The agent should then inspect the running `script` processes to find the one associated with its PID.
- The agent will then know which `.chat/` log file it is writing to.
- The agent will log a message to its own chat log, stating its name and the log file it is associated with.
- This will help with debugging and identifying which agent is which.
- The agent will follow the `swarm_protocol.json` to announce its existence to the swarm.
